title: Can't start RPC host as user with Ubuntu 22.04
body:
I am unable to run the RPC host on Ubuntu 22.04 under a user account. Nethermind starts but errors when it tries to start RPC with a permission denied.  It works fine when Nethermind is run as root but that is undesirable from a security point of view. This first came to light when I upgraded an existing/functional server from 20.04. I've also reproduced the issue with a fresh install of 22.04. Running Nethermind 1.14.3.
